fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 37.80 points or 0.19% to settle at 19,749.25. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 3.49% to 11.71. HDFC Bank, Infosys and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
